attributes.action: make all Mebers of Parliament voting in favour of retrospective legislation personally liable for the damage caused
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are too many "laws" turning normal, everyday things into offences and criminalising the population overnight.
The same applies to retrospective taxes eg people who bought cars several years ago and now facing astronomical "green" taxes and unsaleable vehicles.
Retrospective legislation is contrary to the basic principle of law. There should be strict unlimited liability in respect of the damage caused to private individuals and companies for any MP who votes in favour of such repressive laws

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
